mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over (order by A.ACC_CD) as rownum, A.ACC_CD, A.REMAIN_AMT, A.SCHD_DT, A.PROG_STAT, A.PAY_DT, B.CUST_CD, B.SLIP_DATE, B.SLIP_NO, B.SLIP_SEQ, C.PJT_NM FROM T_AC1230 A, T_AC1120 B, T_SM3000 C, T_AC5400 D WHERE A.ACC_UNIT = B.ACC_UNIT AND A.SLIP_DATE = B.SLIP_DATE AND A.SLIP_NO = B.SLIP_NO AND A.JS_CODE = B.JS_CODE AND A.SLIP_SEQ = B.SLIP_SEQ AND C.PJT_CD=D.PJT_CD) t1 WHERE t1.rownum BETWEEN 1 and 300;
